languages.text: "Грозишься? Не стоит, Вольный Торговец. Не желаешь ты видеть, каков я, когда принимаю угрозу близко к сердцу". {n}В потемневших глазах гиганта загорается дурной кровожадный огонек.{/n}
"Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Грозишься? Не стоит, Вольный Торговец. Не желаешь ты видеть, каков я, когда принимаю угрозу близко к сердцу". {n}В потемневших глазах гиганта загорается дурной кровожадный огонек.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Are you threatening me? That is unwise, Rogue Trader. You would not like to see what I am like when I take a threat seriously." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust lights up in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you threatening me? That is unwise, Rogue Trader. You would not like to see what I am like when I take a threat seriously." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust lights up in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you threatening me? That is unwise, Rogue Trader. You don't want to see what I'm like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you threatening me? That is unwise, Rogue Trader. You don't want to see what I'm like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No es muy sensato mostrar agresividad hacia mí, Comerciante Independiente. No le gustaría ver cómo reacciono cuando me tomo a pecho una amenaza». {n}Los oscuros ojos del gigante relucen con un brillo siniestro y sanguinario.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Me está amenazando? No sería sensato, Comerciante Independiente. No le gustaría ver cómo reacciono cuando me tomo a pecho una amenaza». {n}Los oscuros ojos del gigante relucen con un brillo siniestro y sanguinario.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “对我露出獠牙恐怕并不明智，行商浪人。你可不会想看到我认真对待威胁时的样子。”{n}乌尔法阴暗的双眼中闪烁着不祥的嗜血之光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你这是在威胁我吗？这可不明智，行商浪人。你可不会想看到我认真对待威胁时的样子。”{n}乌尔法阴暗的双眼中闪烁着不祥的嗜血之光。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est plutôt vous qui montez les dents, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais je vous le déconseille. Vous n'aimeriez pas voir comment je réagis quand je prends une menace au sérieux. » {n}Un éclat sinistre et sanguinaire dans les yeux sombres du géant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est plutôt vous qui me menacez, mais je vous le déconseille. Vous n'aimeriez pas voir comment je réagis quand je prends une menace au sérieux. » {n}Un éclat sinistre et sanguinaire dans les yeux sombres du géant.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺に牙を向けるとは、賢明じゃないな、自由開拓者。脅しを真に受けた俺がどうなるか、見たくもないだろう」{n}巨人の暗い瞳に不吉な血の閃光が宿る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺に牙を向けるとは、賢明じゃないな、自由開拓者。脅しを真に受けた俺がどうなるか、見たくもないだろう」{n}巨人の暗い瞳に不吉な血の閃光が宿る。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist unklug, mir zu drohen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wollt mich nicht erleben, wenn ich eine Drohung ernst nehme." {n}Ein dunkles Funkeln der Blutlust flammt in den düsteren Augen des Riesen auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Droht Ihr mir etwa? Das ist unklug, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich wollt mich nicht erleben, wenn ich eine Drohung ernst nehme." {n}Ein dunkles Funkeln der Blutlust flammt in den düsteren Augen des Riesen auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bana diş göstermek akıl kârı olmaz Hür Tacir. Bir tehdidi ciddiye aldığımda neye dönüştüğümü görmek istemezsin." {n}Devin kararmış gözlerinde kana susamışlığın habis parıltısını görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Baring your fangs at me is unwise, Rogue Trader. You do not want to see what I am like when I take a threat to heart." {n}A sinister glint of bloodlust flares in the giant's darkened eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bana diş göstermek akıl kârı değil Hür Tacir. Bir tehdidi ciddiye aldığımda neye dönüştüğümü görmek istemezsin." {n}Devin kararmış gözlerinde kana susamışlığın habis parlaması görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
